original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre mucalindamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā uruvelāyam viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre mucalinda mūle paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedī.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena bhagavā sattāham eka pallaṅkena nisinnaḥ hoti vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

original: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho udapādi sattāhavaddalikā sītavātaduddinī.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena mahā akāla meghaḥ udapādi satta aha vaddalikā sīta vāta duddinī

original: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājā sakabhavanā nikkhamitvā bhagavato kāyaṁ sattakkhattuṁ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṁ phaṇaṁ vihacca aṭṭhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho mucalindaḥ nāga rājā saka bhavanā nikkhamitvā bhagavato kāyam satta kkhattum bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari muddhani mahantam phaṇam vihacca aṭṭhāsi

original: “mā bhagavantaṁ sītaṁ, mā bhagavantaṁ uṇhaṁ, mā bhagavantaṁ ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphasso”ti.
analyzed: mā bhagavantam sīta mā bhagavantam uṇha mā bhagavantam ḍasama kasa vāta ātapa sarīsapa samphassa uti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsi

original: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājā viddhaṁ vigatavalāhakaṁ devaṁ viditvā bhagavato kāyā
analyzed: atha khalu mucalindaḥ nāga rājā viddham vigata valāhakam devam viditvā bhagavataḥ kāyā

original: bhoge viniveṭhetvā sakavaṇṇaṁ paṭisaṁharitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā bhagavato
analyzed: bhoge viniveṭhetvā sa ka vaṇṇam paṭisaharitvā māṇavaka vaṇṇam abhinimminitvā bhagavataḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
